text: The 1982 Navy Midshipmen football team represented the United States Naval Academy (USNA) during the 1982 NCAA Division I-A football season. Navy competed as an independent with no conference affiliation. The team was led by first-year head coach Gary Tranquill. ==Schedule== ==Roster== ==References== Navy Midshipmen Category:Navy Midshipmen football seasons Category:1982 in sports in Maryland
title: 1982 Navy Midshipmen football team
